Bash(git -C /Users/agworkywork/ahoy-little-platform commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix duplicate MP3 loads in Safari, play/pause toggle, and restyle bottom bar

- Remove audioElement.load\(\) from stalled/suspend/abort handler \(Safari fires aggressively\)
- All togglePlay\(\) paths now use resume\(\) instead of play\(\) to avoid re-fetching audio
- Same-track detection uses String\(id\) comparison for type-safe matching
- resume\(\) optimistically sets isPlaying for instant icon toggle
- Suppress "audio failed to load" toast during session state restoration
- Queue button is now icon-only \(removed "Queue" text label\)
- Redesigned bottom bar: deeper glass effect, purple gradient play button, refined glow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /Users/agworkywork/ahoy-little-platform add app.py static/js/player.js static/css/main.css templates/base.html templates/music.html templates/player.html)

Bash(git -C /Users/agworkywork/ahoy-little-platform commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix audio proxy \(missing requests import\) and exempt from rate limit

- proxy_audio\(\) used `requests` without importing it — every call was 500
- Added `import requests as requests_lib` inside the function
- Exempt /proxy/audio from rate limiter \(audio streams shouldn''t count\)
- Suppress error toast during session state restoration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/agworkywork/ahoy-little-platform commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve login UX, clean up my-saves, fix account stats

- Auto-fill last-used identifier on login for returning users
- Inline forgot-password panel in login card \(no page navigation\)
- Auto-redirect to /auth after successful password reset
- Inject window.userProfile server-side for logged-in users
- Remove "Explorer"/"Discovering new sounds" from my-saves
- Dynamic title \("My Collection"\) when 3+ bookmarks saved
- Show @username with link to /account on my-saves profile
- Account stats now use client-side bookmarks as source of truth

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/agworkywork/ahoy-little-platform commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate videos + what''s new to DB; archive legacy JSON files

Content that was previously served only from static JSON files is now
dynamic via PostgreSQL on Render, so new videos and platform updates
no longer require a code deploy or app store update.

**Videos \(videos.json → content_videos table\):**
- New model `ContentVideo` with all fields from videos.json
- DB query `get_all_videos\(\)` with 600s TTL cache
- `/events` route now tries DB first, falls back to JSON

**What''s New \(whats_new.json → content_whats_new table\):**
- New model `WhatsNewItem` storing year/month/section/items
- DB query `get_all_whats_new\(\)` reconstructs the nested structure
- All 4 whats-new routes \(`/api/whats-new`, `/whats-new`,
  `/whats-new/<year>/<month>`, `/whats-new/<year>/<month>/<section>`\)
  now try DB first, fall back to JSON

**Migration & deploy:**
- Alembic migration 0024 creates both tables
- Import script `scripts/import_videos_whats_new.py` \(idempotent upsert\)
- Added to `scripts/migrate_and_start.sh` for auto-import on deploy

**Legacy cleanup:**
- Moved dead JSON files to `archive/legacy-json/`:
  `users_auth.json`, `collections.json`, `newsletter.json`
- Copied `videos.json` and `whats_new.json` to archive for reference
  \(originals stay in place as fallbacks\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
